TopicTitle: Trajectory predictor and maneuver planner completely disappears after unconventional takeoff.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: 13th Gen Intel i7-13620h | GPU: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 4050 Laptop GPU | RAM: 15.71 GB

 

Hello, the bug I am reporting is as follows, while doing an unconventional takeoff from Minmus (see screenshots) in which I kind of "slid" along the ice, sustaining some damage to the craft, the Trajectory predictor and maneuver planner completely disappeared from my map view when I pressed M. These elements did not reappear upon reloading saves...

 

Included Attachments:

@jamresch I am sorry but only 1 screenshot uploaded.
Can you please:
1. Submit a new bug report with me in the title
2. Supply the other screenshots. You can put 1 screenshot per separate categories or zip them all if there's more than 5. All 5 uploads boxes can do any file type.
3. Supply a link back to this bug report so I know which one it belongs to.

Sorry for the inconvenience. We are looking at clarifying how  to use them.
